text: New short on @realmoney $AAPL Gone for the week, to my haters, lovers and friends - trade/invest wisely and enjoy the weekend!!! @dougkass @seabreezelp Will be on @realmoney

Aug 18, 2022 | 08:45 AM EDT DOUG KASS I have covered my ($BBBY) short at $19.85 for a profit - shorted above $26 yesterday. I suspect the shares will ultimately move much lower, timing uncertain, but I don't want to be overwhelmed by a 67% borrow rate or by the distraction.

"Passive investing - quant strategies like risk parity and exchange traded funds - are machine and algorithm driven. They are emotionless and operate at breakneck speed. Passive investing worships at the altar of price momentum - they know everything about price and little about

value. This helps to explain why these systematic programs 'buy high and sell low.' The influence of passive products and strategies cannot be understated as they have become the tail that wags the investment dog." @tomkeene @jimcramer @ferrotv @business @threadreaderapp unroll
